faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services
faq.q1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.a1: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. Small projects can take 2-4 weeks, while enterprise solutions may take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during consultation.
faq.a2: Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support including maintenance, updates, and technical assistance to ensure your solution continues to perform optimally.
faq.q3: Can you work with our existing team?
faq.a3: Absolutely! We excel at team augmentation and can seamlessly integrate with your existing development processes and team structure.
faq.q4: What technologies do you specialize in?
faq.a4: We work with modern technologies including React, Node.js, Python, Java, AI/ML frameworks, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), and mobile development tools.
